description:
Loyalty programs are structured marketing efforts designed to encourage customers to continue to shop at or use the services of businesses associated.

For many organizations there are the corner stone around which the entire marketing effort is focused. In fact it’s difficult to think of a Fortune 500 or for that matter any highly successful company which doesn’t leverage this important marketing tool.

The course is divided into two parts. First part talks about how to maximize gains due to loyalty programs. And second part is about creating an e-commerce loyalty program that gains conversion.

This lecture is a complete package that covers everything from why loyalty programs are beneficial, to how one can create loyalty programs for own business.
title: Loyalty programs: Offers & Promotions
